name: Sonic Alive
description:
This is a non-profit fangame that is not affiliated with Sega or Sonic Team. Use the arrow keys to move. This is just a demo and is not the final version so things are subject to change. I'm not planning on having chemical plant zone be the first zone it's just that the music doesn't slowly drive me insane.

The platformer engine is a heavily modified version of griffpatch's simple starter platformer on his scratch tutor account:

 https://scratch.mit.edu/users/griffpatch_tutor/

Sega for Sonic the Hedgehog.

If you could, please fill out the feedback form:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdUWLxGnD__B4v2pd3Z9q8Gzvk-aiHQlEtnmyIC...
